overview:
Shaun Nykvist is a prolific researcher in the use of Information and Communication Technologies in Education. He has had vast experience in working with developing countries and as a result has developed many educational programs to assist these countries. These programs range from primary school education to tertiary masters degree programs in ICT.

Shaun is also one of the founding directors of Pipegrep Consulting. A small Australian based company that provides a range of Internet based technologies fot its clients.
